translation:
Reserved

I have just received official reports from the President of Santa Catarina stating that the town of Laguna has been restored, as well as that of Lages, and the rebels expelled from both and defeated, with great loss; a force from São Paulo of 1200 men arrived at Lages and occupies and garrisons this district. By the end of this month, a strong column of ours will be sent out through the North and Mostardas, and according to the plan that is agreed upon, it is incumbent upon Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency
Government Palace in Porto Alegre, December 4, 1839
Saturnino de Sousa e Oliveira

Mr. Ma- Major Manuel José Simas. It is agreed.
Luís José Ribeiro Barreto. It is agreed.
Manuel Vieira Lima
The interim chief officer.
Vicente Ferrer de Almeida.

Annexed to document CV-133
